description:
Akira conjures up a virtual space where Minami is a classmate, Alma a transfer student, and the rest of the Squad is also involved in a high school setting.
The Squad attempts to revive Akira`s memories by stimulating his subconscience, and are secretly joined by Ygg.
Akira ends up facing off against "Beta," an individual identical to himself possessing EX-ARM Number 11, which caused great destruction in Tokyo. He comes to believe that Beta is the root cause of everything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ときめきデイドリーム!
